website_summaries.verdict: Functional, simple, and conveniently designed, the stylish LG 450 delivers above-average stats, making it an all-around reliable flip phone.
pros: Send and receive texts and images
cons: Only works with Metro PCS and T-Mobile

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for my mother in law
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my mother in law who only needs to make phone calls. The new touch screen/smart phones would just be too overwhelming for her. She loves it so therefore, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wargo

customer_reviews.title: Keep it simple
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this phone is hard to beat. I had to send my smartphone back for repairs, and I used this phone for about a month while I waited. I would highly recommend this phone for simple texting and making phone calls. The browser / camera are not particularly stellar, but that is expected on a phone this cheap. While you may add features by going with a bottom of the line smart phone for $80-100, you are also giving up reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this phone. I had another one similar to this one, but there is no comparison as this one is great. I had bought a smartphone for Christmas and I hated it. I am just glad I did not pay a lot for it. I am a senior and the instruction were so easy to follow and I like the large numbers. I would recommend this phone to anyone that does not like the smartphones and don't need the data as all I needed was the talk and text.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Scott

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my Grandmother to replace her older failing flip phone.
customer_reviews.text: My asian grandmother is very technology illiterate so this basic flip phone is perfect for her daily use. All she needed was something to make phone calls nothing fancy and this worked great out of the box. Only needed to pop in her SIM card and do some basic time and date setup and it was good to go. On the plus side is that it uses almost no power unlike today's smartphones which only lasts about 8 hours before recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Sewell

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD for seniors, advertising lies
customer_reviews.text: This phone is terrible. Don't believe the "senior phone" lies. Despite all the senior settings, the incoming call notifications ARE TINY. The design is a joke. Even with the font set to large, incoming calls show up in a very small font in one little corner of the main screen, using maybe 10% of the height. WHAT ARE THEY SAVING THE OTHER 90% FOR?? Completely useless, can't even see who is calling. That's not even counting the mini-display on the outside when phone is closed (also miniscule). I got this for an 85 year old based on supposed "senior" features. Don't waste your money. This thing is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a similar cell phone for $15, so I was surprised how expansive they are now. The reason I gave it 4 stars is, that it doesn't come with the SIM card, like they used to. And I wish they say it, because I returned the first one for a missing SIM card, and ordered another one, which also came without the SIM card. So it became obvious, that it's not included. In order to make this phone work, you need to buy T- Mobile SIM card separately for another $10.
customer_reviews.author: Nadezda

customer_reviews.title: phone for 85 year old mom
customer_reviews.text: works for my 85 year old mom. The numbers were large enough to see, ringer loud. She had a prepaid T mobile plan which worked fine when I put her SIM card in. Looks like it came with one too.
customer_reviews.author: PBR fan

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH A SIM CARD, Good Phone, Has Call Block, T-Mobile Compatible
customer_reviews.text: This phone has Call Block which is is the main reason I purchased it (it can blocks 25 numbers at a time). Another reviewer on here mentioned that it came with a T-Mobile Sim card. Mine DID NOT but fortunately the one that was in my previous phone fit it exactly right. So be sure to order a Sim card for it if you don't already have one starting with 8901, I think the Sim size is "regular" or "standard" but I could be wrong about that. Definitely T-Mobile compatible but it also could not read the entries on my old sim card for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Lady

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a small phone just for calls and battery life...found it!
customer_reviews.text: It's got the camera and basic apps. Though, my reason for buying this phone is to simply make calls and for it's battery life. My smartphone's battery lasted about 13-14 hours. So far, I've gotten three and a half days on one of three battery life bars. I probably used about 15 minutes of talk time and spent about 20 minutes entering contact phone numbers in that period of time. The rest was stand by time. I never turned it off. It's just what I was looking for. Oh and by the way, the small size is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: moto.m

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my parents, and was happy to discover it was able to get better signal on T-mobile than their old Nokia 6550, which is quite old by now. Surprisingly enough it got signal even though my iPhone 6 did not. Navigating the menus was easy to customize sounds and settings. set up was as easy as shoving in the SIM card, although the slot is a bit small so it requires a bit more force than usual to get the SIM card in.
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Kid has phone/social media addiction? This is the phone for you!
customer_reviews.text: Phone does exactly what it was purchased to do, which was keep my teenager off the internet... I'm able to still contact him when needed, without having the distraction of internet/games while at school. It did include a sim kit, as the description stated. I logged in to my Tmobile account, activated the sim to his line, and it works just as normal as any other phone. I realized later that I could have just inserted the original sim card we already had without having to do an activation, as the sim "kit" is basically a micro sim with adapters attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flip phones have their uses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who just isn't ready for the smartphone world we live in. He's an old farmer that typically has some leather gloves on or hands full and can't be bothered with touch screen phones. This works well for his needs. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Woff Den

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for my daughter. I charged the battery, inserted the sim card, and took it into a T-Mobile store to have it activated to my daughter's previous phone number - works great! I also have one like it. These phones are durable and can survive accidental drops, etc... Smart phones are overrated. I'm at a computer all day at work and when I get home I have access to either a laptop or a PC - isn't that enough? When is enough enough? Aren't we plugged in enough as it is? Again, this is a great phone - to be used as a phone - which is really all we need :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newberry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service - Senior Friendly Phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my dad because of its senior-friendly functions. Sent the phone to LG for warranty repair after a few months use. LG repaired and reset phone back to factory settings which locked it and rendered it useless on T-mobile network. The device was a discontinued product and the ONLY phone my dad liked. Notified seller who instructed me to send phone to them and they successfully unlocked phone and restored its use. My dad is a happy camper. I'm very grateful for the exceptional customer service Jetpack Outlet Store provided me and highly recommend them to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: K. Warner

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY TO HAVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Jeesh, I've been looking for a flip phone for so long. Glad I found this one. Works great and I really prefer flip-phones because they're small and fit well in ones pockets. Also, flip-phones don't dial themselves in your pockets. Just what I was looking for! Best inexpensive phone I've found.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Battery drains too fast. Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone twice. Once a year ago but my grandma lost it and now a month ago. For some reason, right now the batter discharges very fast for a flip phone. I bought another battery from LG but it's still draining. So obviously I am not happy that this flip phone drains faster than my smart phone
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: variable quality
customer_reviews.text: I re-purchased after the first phone lasted years with no problems. The second lasted 6 months before the screen self destructed.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael

customer_reviews.title: The worst phone ever
customer_reviews.text: The worst phone ever...! after just 30 days, sound system kept going in and out. Now I am having to contact LG directly after contacting Amazon Rep.
customer_reviews.author: King Yul

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used with Metro, have a different SIM card now
customer_reviews.text: My mom used to use with Metro I bought replacement phone and metro said they don't use those phones anymore, the SIM is different, not bad phone but sellers should update info
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hanson

customer_reviews.title: The features are simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandpa so he could hear clearly. The call volume is loud enough for what he needs. The features are simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Durable easy basic phone
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and durable phone for the basics. Perfect for someone interested in using their phone for actually making calls as primary purpose but has the extra gadgets if later user wants to play
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: I received the phone and was happy with it for a bit
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I received the phone and was happy with it for a bit. Then it began to give me problems with the service connection and I’m really upset about that. Besides for that, the phone is ok. I bought a new phone and it works like a charm. This phone does not work well on the T Mobil network.
customer_reviews.author: eva gestetner

customer_reviews.title: Works for visually impaired people
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone for my visually impaired mother. Language can also be Spanish and that is exactly what we needed. This is my second time around purchasing this phone for her since there are limitations out there as to what works for a visually impaired, elderly, Spanish-speaking person. She loves it and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: fabiola castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great BlueTooth Flip Phone
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with a cell phone. I don't like texting, so I don't need a Smart Phone. The Blue Tooth technology allows me to talk hands free in my car. Battery seems to last pretty good as well. Note - if you do a lot of texting, you are probably not looking at flip phones in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: J. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but slippery.
customer_reviews.text: He wanted a flip phone. He got a flip phone. Just as advertised. Good shipper. Easy to hear & program. Worked for the Luddite in my family. I stuck some Velcro on it to keep it from shooting out of his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Artbelles

customer_reviews.title: LG 450 Black
customer_reviews.text: Nothing out beat this phone- not even a smart phone. I love it and they last for years. I am glad that I bought it. Thank you for having it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Phone is a trooper!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my mom a while back and surprisingly it's still working. Phone is simple to use which is why I bought it for my mother as she is not tech savvy. The UI is very simple (big + for the elderly). Definitely recommend it for the elderly.
customer_reviews.author: Abimael sosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. It is a little slow to turn on but it has a nice big screen and it is easy to use. Battery life is not great, but it is good. I would recommend for anyone wanting a nice basic "go" phone.
customer_reviews.author: JJO

customer_reviews.title: not a good phone. will be returning it
customer_reviews.text: battery does not last 24 hours,not a good phone. will be returning it,waiting for the replacement phone
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for dad. He loves it!! Very easy to use with wide buttons to touch. has very pretty blue color, its light and does the job 100%. Worth every penny. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: S.K

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, nice price, nice buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this LG450 phone (came with battery & Sim card, but didn't need to use the card) for my Cousin for his Father's Day gift since his current phone was damaged. Phone arrived sooner then the expected delivery date. Price was $30 cheaper then what I saw on T-Mobile's website. He has a month to month account with T-Mobile as I do too. This phone works with pre-paid as well as month to month on TMobile. After I put his Sim card in the phone it was up and ready to use so he called my phone. We LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: durable phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as a replacement to the original buy for my father-in-law and it is a very durable phone and heavy duty he loved it
customer_reviews.author: AllyCamacho93

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: For a simple basic non-smart phone this phone is a great choice. I had a ZTE phone which was very durable but what makes the LG phone superior is the menu system and additional menu features.
customer_reviews.author: BlackBeltJoel

customer_reviews.title: well its a steal for thirty bucks given you also ...
customer_reviews.text: well its a steal for thirty bucks given you also get a sim card. Then you can get a 3 dollar a month plan from T-Mobile. Phones don't have to be expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived scratched all over the face plate. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived scratched all over the face plate. This WAS a birthday present, I cannot give this as a gift now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stottlemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Wife (HAPPY?) so far
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted the exact same phone as her OLD one. Even though discontinued, this seems to please her, so far! Working like her OLD one, so she says! VERY hard please...
customer_reviews.author: James Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa Approves
customer_reviews.text: Trust me, if it works for my grandfather it can work for you
customer_reviews.author: The Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and has a loud ring, which works great for my mother who is hard of hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Lisha

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift & hasn't been given to recipient yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sabresfan

customer_reviews.title: the sound is terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: the sound is terrible!!!!! i think the phone was used or damaged. i wanted to return it but every time ups came i was not home. very very disappointing and now i have to spend time looking for another phone that will take my plan and not force me to change my number. don't buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: katiepace

customer_reviews.title: flip phone
customer_reviews.text: as usual from china and does not work correctly i can not reset date and time that function is not under phone settings
customer_reviews.author: harry w oneal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small pocket sized phone
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find this size phone anymore. I like to keep my phone in my pants pocket, not lug it around in a pocketbook which I don't carry anymore.. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Levitt

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: This phone barely worked out of the box. Calls kept failing, wouldn't pick up network, battery drained after 1-2 hours of NO USAGE. No response from sellers.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: perfect for elderly
customer_reviews.text: If you need a phone for a elder this is the perfect phone
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Functional, Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a small and easy to use phone. This LG phone was exactly what I was looking for and it has a good battery and a good sound. I am well pleased with this phone and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Just The Facts

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: So I have been looking for a T-Mobile Flip Phone for forever and finally decided to look on Amazon since T-Mobile only offers no name brand flip phones now and they are about $80-$100. After I opened the LG 450 I was a bit skeptical since it said metro pcs when you turn it off, but then I put in the sim card and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: my grandma is anti-touchscreen. She loves this phone. I like this phone too. If my iPhone SIM card would fit here, I would buy one to use when I feel like going retro. I'm serious, sometimes I miss flip phones.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Phone came but battery will not hold charge...let them know for replacement of battery and have not heard back?
customer_reviews.author: sally21

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good for children than don't need to be on the internet. Good emergency phone
customer_reviews.author: tsuri4

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the $3 a month service is great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Same phone at half the price as the t-mobile store. Works great and the $3 a month service is great for our limited use family member.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: great deal, comes with Sim card
customer_reviews.text: great deal - much better price than buying it from T-Mobile. Even comes with a Sim card (which I didn't use)
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works find. Just wish the font size can be bigger and the buttons too.
customer_reviews.author: polarbearpilot

customer_reviews.title: ... t mobil but still corrected called twice so not happy about that at all
customer_reviews.text: getting someones else's number coming up when I call friends and family called t mobil but still corrected called twice so not happy about that at all
customer_reviews.author: ellen larsen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not really hear much through the weird sounds that it was making. It was distorting voices.
customer_reviews.author: SafeeMiah

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Item was received promptly. Needed a cell for my father who does not want a smartphone. This phone fitted his needs which is just to make and receive calls. Exactly as described; easy to install existing T-mobile SIM card and use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: bought for my dad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My dad needed this phone as a replacement and I couldn't find it anywhere other than amazon! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: TheJamerz

customer_reviews.title: My mom is very happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: My mom is very happy with this phone. I picked it up for her so she could have a phone with a small foot print and is easy to use. The battery lasts for several days between charges and the buttons are large enough for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chi H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and just as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and just as described. We use this phone for our contracted line (we just wanted a flip phone), and it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: silent g

customer_reviews.title: It does not even work on the tmibile network
customer_reviews.text: Horrible it's not even working in my tmobile network it didn't bring a charger it's been the worst experience buying from that sorce
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product it meet my expectation, Thanks to the seller,
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new phone but I didn't want one that cost more than my house payment. I also wanted a general use phone and this is perfect. First, I didn't give it 5 stars because I'd like to have a place to attach a strap or neck cord. I am hard on phones. This one has already been dropped and skidded across the room and still works. I bought a cover in red so I could find it easy. I can't list all it does, there is too much. But this is a great phone. I just put my standard SIM card from my last phone in and it was ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Sisujan

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I do like the phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone did not have a SIM card. It cost me an extra $27.00 to buy a SIM card. When the advertisement said "no contract", how was anyone supposed to know that it meant "no SIM card". This was very deceiving. Otherwise I do like the phone. It met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the LG 450 - been looking for an ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the LG 450 - been looking for an inexpensive flip phone to use T-Mobile for some time.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hochrein

customer_reviews.title: Great for a non techie who just needs a phone
customer_reviews.text: Waited to use it before the review. Great for a non techie who just needs a phone. Quite pleased. Works as a phone which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: k.a.s.

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This was a refurbished phone, once charged, there was constant static, the phone was used and refurbished!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elena

customer_reviews.title: A Flipped Out Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great flip phone for someone who wants just a basic phone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomthebomb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good basic cell phone. It has it's good & it's poor points but overall it does the job admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gribling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for an aging t-mobile flip-phone
customer_reviews.text: I have an ancient t-mobile pay-as-you-go flip-phone from when dinosaurs walked the earth. It was falling apart, the buttons not working etc., but I still like the ease of a simple no frills phone. The disposable phones that you get at places like walmart are all locked to the carrier, and my local t-mobile dealers no longer even stock these! So I ordered this, swapped the ximm card, and it worked perfectly. Now I'm good for another ten years!
customer_reviews.author: Symmetry Breaker

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to find item. Price & availability were ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to find item. Price & availability were just what I needed. Delivery was fast. Done deal! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this to replace my Dad's aging flip phone. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my Dad's aging flip phone. It has been 3 weeks and it is working flawlessly.

customer_reviews.title: the phone has been very good at being a
customer_reviews.text: I may be a bit critical because I have not been able to use the camera yet. I read the instructions that tells one what can be done but not what buttons to push and in what order to take and file or even send pictures. Otherwise, the phone has been very good at being a ,phone albeit I have trouble setting the ringer so that I can hear and feel it.

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the phone

customer_reviews.text: Thank you, thank you! I really missed my flip-phone when mine died & thought I'd have to do without! Thanks for the good quality & great service!

customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! This phone is perfect for my mom. It has a fairly large display and large buttons make it easy for her to dial.

customer_reviews.text: Great service. The product works perfectly, and Chubbiestech offered great customer service as well. Very satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for an intelligent but not a smart phone
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an intelligent but not a smart phone, you probably couldn't do better than this. My only complaint is that the battery seems to run down quicker than my previous phone, which lacked the IQ and features of the LG450.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great flip phone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. LG is one of the best flip phones I've owned.

customer_reviews.title: The phone is easy to dial a number
customer_reviews.text: The phone is easy to dial a number. When you need to enter a number on request, forget it! I have to press the key so hard it still won't respond For get this phone
customer_reviews.author: em
